alert.note: Alert for Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 4:17PM EDT until May 09 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following county, Randolph. * WHEN...Until midnight EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gauge reports indicate that flooding along Mill Creek and it`s tributaries is occurring, although the water is beginning to recede. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 414 PM EDT, Gauge reports indicate that flooding along Mill Creek and it`s tributaries is occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mill Creek and Huttonsville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
